meanings.definition: A polygon with ten sides and ten angles.
meanings.sent1: The children learned about a decagon in math class.
meanings.sent2: The playground had a colorful decagon shape on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The decagon invited the other shapes to a party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a perfect decagon of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The decagon looked like a star in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A shape with ten straight sides and ten angles.
meanings.sent1: The decagon was carefully drawn on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry box had a shiny decagon on its lid.
meanings.sent3: The decagon tried to fit in with the circles and squares.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a decagon of conflicting thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The decagon garden was a sight to behold.
